Help us raise $50,000 by June 7 2013!

This will help support 10 Rails Girls students to work on Open Source projects

For every $5,000 raised, we can support one student.

Donate Now

Secure Payments by Stripe Checkout

Rails Girls Summer of Code is all about enabling women work full-time on writing fantastic code for
Open Source projects over the course of three months.

We can only make this happen with your amazing support. Your donation enables us to pay every
student $5,000 during the Summer of Code.

For more information on Summer of Code, please see our FAQ.
